title: Dead Bastard Society – To-Do Masterfile (With Rationale)
purpose: Document what must be built or finished next in the DBS Universe and why it's essential to the vision.

tasks.why: Scrolls are core to DBS prophecy. Unlocking by rank/archetype increases immersion, rewards dedication, and powers lore-based ranking.
The badge system is the glue of the Brotherhood. Connecting badge triggers (via skits, quests, uploads) to rank ensures continuity and gamifies the site.
Lucidus should behave like a real entity. A mood system with variable memory recall adds depth and makes him feel alive and unpredictable.
User hometowns drive narrative expansion. Each new user from a location expands the map, unlocks lore, and generates region-specific strain names.
A personal page that reflects a user’s rank, tags, scrolls, and Latin name will give every member a reason to explore and keep returning.
Using voice to unlock prophecy scrolls adds magic, exclusivity, and keeps guests from randomly accessing sacred lore.
Manual correction and expansion of user files allows custom adjustments. Needed for upgrades, debugging, and narrative expansion.
Members should be able to search world lore and real events through Lucidus, connecting fiction and reality.

tasks.task: 📦 Publish Full Plugin + Theme ZIP for Public Testing
tasks.why: A clean, installable, test-ready package helps onboard collaborators and provides restore capability in case of failure.
The cartoon county map lets users see DBS expand in real time. Core to showing living growth and territorial humor.

tasks.task: 🎙️ Integrate ElevenLabs voice switching by Archetype
tasks.why: Each archetype should have a signature voice. This adds immersion, especially when Lucidus replies in Dub, Randall, or Nasty P tones.

meta.status: Tasks reviewed and prioritized by importance to immersion, gamification, and lore structure.
